text: Thrixopelma ockerti, commonly known as the Peruvian flame rump, is a species of tarantula and the type species of the genus Thrixopelma. It is endemic to Peru. == See also == * List of Theraphosidae species ==References== Category:Theraphosidae Category:Spiders of South America Category:Endemic fauna of Peru Category:Fauna of Peru Category:Spiders described in 1994
title: Thrixopelma ockerti
